data.value: Attribute "{0}" not found in XML file

data.value: Can determine UFO type, crew species and mission

data.name: MGSBOX_BASE_OUT_OF_CRAFT_SUPPLIES
data.value: Base {0} has run out of {1}, which are needed to resupply {2}

data.name: MSGBOX_BASE_NAME_CHANGED
data.value: The base name has been changed.

data.name: MSGBOX_BASE_NAMES_ARE_UNIQUE
data.value: You already have a base called {0}. You need to give the base a different name.

data.name: MSGBOX_BASE_NEEDS_NAME
data.value: You must give the base a name.

data.name: MSGBOX_CANNOT_BUILD_ON_WATER
data.value: Sorry but you cannot build a base over water

data.name: MSGBOX_CANT_FIT
data.value: Base doesn't have enough free storage space for the selected item(s).

data.name: MSGBOX_CRAFT_NOT_IN_BASE
data.value: You can't change {0}. It's not in its home base.

data.name: MSGBOX_START_BATTLESCAPE
data.value: This is the start Battlescape screen, where you get the chance to begin a battlescape mission between {0} and {1}.

data.name: MSGBOX_FINISHED_BUILDING_FACILITY
data.value: Construction of {0} facility has been completed.

data.name: MSGBOX_FUEL_LOW
data.value: Aircraft {0} reports fuel low. Returning to base.

data.name: MSGBOX_INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS
data.value: You don't have enough money for that.

data.name: MSGBOX_MAX_EIGHT_BASES
data.value: You can't have more than eight bases.

data.name: MSGBOX_NO_FACILITY_SELECTED
data.value: You need to select a facility.

data.name: MSGBOX_NO_PURCHASE_SELECTED
data.value: You need to select an item

data.name: MSGBOX_ONLY_ONE_FACILITY_PER_BASE
data.value: Bases can only have one {0} facility, and this base already has one.

data.name: MSGBOX_POD_ALREADY_HAS_WEAPON
data.value: This pod is aready equiped with a weapon

data.name: SCREEN_GEOSCAPE_FIRST_BASE
data.value: Left click on location for first base.

data.name: SCREEN_LOADSAVEGAME_DUPLICATE_FILENAME
data.value: Save game with this name already exists. You need to delete it before you can create another with the same name.

data.name: TEST_LONGTEXT
data.value: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Curabitur bibendum, orci vel imperdiet pretium, purus ligula viverra leo, ut condimentum mauris risus porta tellus. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Etiam non magna vel justo placerat aliquet. Vivamus sit amet sapien. Praesent luctus. Quisque vehicula ipsum in metus. Maecenas blandit, orci non auctor sollicitudin, tellus lacus porttitor lacus, eu consectetuer mauris purus nec quam. Quisque malesuada quam nec metus mattis porta. Etiam ligula. Donec accumsan augue in nunc. Quisque eu justo ac sem malesuada ultrices. Nullam fermentum. Praesent sed nulla et enim eleifend dictum. Cras arcu.
data.comment: Lorum ipsum passage for testing text layout.

data.name: XENOERROR_CELL_HAS_NO_NEIGHBOURS
data.value: You can't build there, all facilities must have a fully constructed neighbour.

data.name: XENOERROR_DELETE_WILL_SPLIT_BASE
data.value: You can't destory this facility. All facilities must have access to the lift.

data.name: XENOERROR_FACILITY_IS_IN_USE
data.value: You can't destroy this facility, it is in use.

data.name: XENOERROR_POSITION_ALREADY_OCCUPIED
data.value: You can't build there, that position is already in use.

data.name: XENOERROR_POSITION_NOT_IN_BASE
data.value: You can't build there, not all the facility will be inside the base.

data.name: YESNOMSG_BUILD_BASE_HERE
data.value: Build this base now? Cost: {0} Area: {1}

data.name: MSGBOX_OUTPOST_ATTACKING_UFO_CRASHED
data.value: Base {0} defenses shot down {1}. Check crash site for survivors and salvage.

data.name: MSGBOX_NOT_CARRYING_SOLDIERS
data.value: {0} is not carring any troops. It can't attack {1}

data.name: SCREEN_RESEARCH_IDLE_SCIENTISTS

data.name: MSGBOX_DESTINATION_CANT_FIT_ITEMS
data.value: Destination Base doesn't have enough free storage space for the selected item(s)

data.name: MSGBOX_NEED_2_BASES_TO_TRANSFER
data.value: In order to transfer items between bases, you must have at least two base.

data.name: MSGBOX_SOURCE_AND_DESTINATION_SAME
data.value: When transferring, you can't send items to the same Base they're comming from.

data.name: SCREEN_LOADSAVEGAME_VERSION_CONFLICT

data.value: This outpost doesn't have enough space to hold the finished item.

data.name: ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_RESEARCH_FOR_BUILD
data.value: You can't build something you haven't researched.

data.value: Manufacturing of {0} at base {1} has been stopped. {2}

data.value: Staff can only start psi training at the beginning of a month.

data.value: No more xcaps of this type in craft

data.value: No "None" armor type has been defined

data.value: Texture Atlas Bitmap dimensions differ from expected.

data.name: SCREEN_BATTLESCAPE_COMBATANT_STATS
data.value: TUs: {0}/{1}, Health Max/Wound/Stun/Left {2}/{3}/{4}/{5} ToDo: other stats to show

data.name: EXCEPTION_NO_SHADER_CARD_FOUND
data.value: Can't run. You must have a graphics card that is at least capable of shader v1.1. And shader 2.0 is strongly recommended.

data.name: EXCEPTION_UFO_CREW_TOO_BIG
data.value: There are too many aliens crewing a UFO. Maximum crew size is 32.

data.name: ACTION_ERROR_INSUFFICENT_AMMO
data.value: Weapon has insufficent Ammunition to do this.

data.name: ACTION_ERROR_INSUFFICENT_TUS
data.value: Soldier has insufficent TUs remaining this turn to do this.
